entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
